thread.title: REIGN: Gulls down Reign in shootout in exhibition game
thread.title_full: REIGN: Gulls down Reign in shootout in exhibition game - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: REIGN: Gulls down Reign in shootout in exhibition game
text:
STAFF REPORTS
Published: Oct. 2, 2015 Updated: 11:13 p.m. The Ontario Reign opened its season with a shootout loss to the visiting San Diego Gulls in an exhibition game.
Valentin Zykov evened the score at 2-2 on a power-play goal with 8:03 left in the third period to send the game into a five minute 3-on-3 overtime and eventually to a shootout.
Goalkeeper Matt Hackett made all three saves against the Ontario shooters for the Gulls win.
San Diego was up 2-0 after an early goal from Bryan Moore with 17:51 left in the first and a second period power-play goal from Harry Zolnierczyuk.
Alex Roach first put the Reign on the board with 2:32 left in the second.
